TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InstalledVoice extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含有关 Windows 中安装的语音合成的声音的信息。

span.span: Contains information about a speech synthesis voice installed in Windows.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Enabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置某个声音是否可用来生成语音。

span.span: Gets or sets whether a voice can be used to generate speech.

value.span: 返回表示声音的启用状态的 。

span.span: Returns a that represents the enabled state of the voice.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下, 属性的`true`值为。The value of the property is `true` by default. 当应用程序调用时, 该方法会验证它在注册表中找到的每个声音是否满足某些最小标准。When an application calls , the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria. 对于验证失败的任何语音, 将其属性设置`false`为。For any voice that fails verification, sets its property to `false`. 应用程序无法选择其属性为`false`的声音。An application cannot select a voice whose property is `false`. 通常, 应用程序不会设置语音的属性。Typically, applications will not set a voice's property.
